fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
Factional chat
No factional kill
Maximum 4 members
One member is the lead at a time, whilst other members only have access to their familiar abilities and attributes.
If the lead dies, a random member is promoted.
Each night after the first, a Devil Deal has a chance of being offered to the lead (10% + luck). The lead may forfeit their position for an attack or defence upgrade, or to make their next attack astral.
After every successful kill, there's a chance of getting an item (5% + luck), which is randomly a range, damage or luck upgrade.
Roles have three stats:
Range: Maximum amount of spaces away on the playerlist a target can be.
Damage: Attack level.
Luck: Percentage which influences chance of Devil Deals and Items.
